// Pivot 0, 0
int mapchain[16] = {
	240, 390,
	251, 366,
	260, 363,
	266, 370,
	266, 419,
	236, 439,
	225, 437,
	225, 426
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float mapchain[16] = {
	0.415225f, 0.750000f,
	0.434256f, 0.703846f,
	0.449827f, 0.698077f,
